TopicTitle: The New SRB effects are awesome! (HD!)

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program: The New SRB effects are awesome! (HD!)

In addition to the totally epic new effects on the Solid Rocket Boosters, the engines look really cool when they get red hot. Also, staging is great.

My favorite part of this video is when the radial SRBs drop away. It\'s really short and I just felt like uploading. The mission parachuted down after a maximum altitude of only 12,000 meters or so. This was just a little demo.
I believe the tohedrial (Or whatever the spelling is for that) engine has the same effect too.
